summary: The implementation provides a comprehensive AdAware Explainable AI Framework with Motoko backend, React/TypeScript frontend, and all required pages. Most requirements are satisfied, including backend data structures, prediction logic, analytics methods, all frontend pages (Home, Predict, Results, Model Insights, Admin Dashboard, About), navigation, custom canvas-based charts, and PDF generation. However, the diff is truncated and several files are omitted, making full verification impossible. Notable gaps include missing Home page implementation, incomplete About page content, and placeholder PDF generation using TXT format instead of actual PDF.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create Home page with project overview section explaining AdAware as an Explainable AI decision-support system for predicting adolescent concern over unhealthy food advertisements, hero section with call-to-action button linking to prediction form, and overview of key features (ML prediction, SHAP explainability, health recommendations)
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx implementation. The file is referenced in App.tsx routing but its content is not provided in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build Predict page with input form containing all 7 fields (Age Group dropdown with 13-15/16-18/19+, Gender radio buttons Male/Female, Daily Screen Time dropdown <2hrs/2-5hrs/>5hrs, Primary Platform dropdown YouTube/Instagram/TV/Multiple, Ad Frequency dropdown Rare/Sometimes/Often, Ad Type dropdown Fast Food/Sugary Drinks/Snacks, Ad Persuasiveness dropdown Low/Medium/High), submit button, and loading animation during prediction
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include frontend/src/pages/Predict.tsx implementation. While usePrediction hook is present, the actual form page is omitted from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create Results page displaying predicted concern level as prominent badge (Low/Medium/High with distinct colors), personalized health recommendation text based on user inputs and prediction, placeholder section for SHAP explanation visualization, and download PDF button for generating report
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include frontend/src/pages/Results.tsx implementation. The file is referenced in routing but content is missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement Model Insights page showing mock ML performance metrics (Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1 scores for Random Forest), confusion matrix visualization as heatmap chart, feature importance bar chart ranking all 7 input features, and model comparison chart comparing Random Forest vs Logistic Regression performance
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include frontend/src/pages/ModelInsights.tsx implementation. While individual chart components exist, the page that assembles them is missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement PDF report generation functionality triggered from Results page that creates downloadable PDF including user inputs, predicted concern level, SHAP explanation summary (placeholder text), personalized recommendation, timestamp, and AdAware branding header
missing_requirements.reason: The DownloadPDFButton component references generatePredictionReport from '../utils/pdfGenerator', but the pdfGenerator utility file is not included in the diff. The button label says 'Download Report (TXT)' suggesting TXT format instead of PDF, which does not meet the PDF requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom canvas-based chart implementations instead of Chart.js library integration
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-11 explicitly requires 'Integrate Chart.js library for rendering all data visualizations', but the implementation uses native HTML canvas with manual rendering in all chart components (ConcernDistributionPie, AgeGroupAnalysis, GenderBiasChart, ConfusionMatrix, FeatureImportance, ModelComparison). No Chart.js imports or usage detected.
